snippet: The fierce desire of a group of women to become mothers upended centuries-old gender rules and may have helped open the door for Vietnam to redefine parenthood.
abstract: Loi Journal; fierce desire of group of Vietnamese women to become unwed mothers after Vietnam War upended centuries-old gender rules and may have helped open door for Vietnam to redefine parenthood.
lead_paragraph: The fierce desire of a group of women to become mothers upended centuries-old gender rules and may have helped open the door for Vietnam to redefine parenthood.

headline.seo: In Vietnam, Some Chose to Be Single Mothers
headline.main: A Tiny Village Where Women Chose to Be Single Mothers
